description_html: Watercolor’s hyperfocus on brushstrokes, on the process of making art and the fluidity of materials, channels the waterfall paintings of Pat Steir. Like the contemporary artist, Innovations’ 52-inch Watercolor wallcovering explores the vertical movement of water and paint in eight colors inspired by spring, from a viridescent pastel to rich Raw Umber. A tremendous amount of color, digitally rendered, goes into each large-scale piece.
